author: The School of Life
description:
Emotional Intelligence, Daily. Start now: https://www.theschooloflife.com/subscription/ 

This is an original podcast from @ChrisWillx  uploaded with their permission to The School of Life.  If you liked this please check out their other content.
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/chriswillx   
Twitter:  http://www.x.com/chriswillx  
Email:  https://chriswillx.com/contact/

Expect to learn: where bad inner voices come from, why we struggle to connect with our emotions, if there is a danger of intellectualising too much, Alain’s advice for obsessive people who want to let go, advice for an anxious person dealing with an avoidant one, why we get stuck in unhappy relationships, how to improve your self worth and much more…

Unlock all the content of The School of Life with a subscription to our podcast, articles, videos, and exercises, specially tailored to your needs.

-

00:00 Where Do Bad Inner Voices Come From?
08:22 Healing a Negative Inner Voice
22:31 Why Do We Struggle to Fully
title: How To Fix Your Negative Patterns - Alain de Botton on Chris Williamson
